import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import EditCard from '../Components/EditCard' import { useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Edit(){ const {id} = useParams() const url = `http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/v1/id/${id}` const [data, setData] = useState([]); useEffect(()=> fetch(url) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data=>setData(data) ),[] ) let content = null console.log(data.result) if(data.result){ content = (
) } return(

Edit Page

{content}
) } export default Edit
